about_the_game:
It is a 2D adventure plot puzzle game. Adapted from real events in China, players will take on the role of the protagonist to learn about the tragic events that occurred in a hospital in the past.

Are you willing to sacrifice?

As night falls and mist envelops, you step into this cursed land. There seems to be a faint call in your ears, a voice from deep within, leading you to explore deeper. You will explore within this hospital, seek the truth, and make choices.

This is an unknown territory!

Every step hides a mystery, and every choice leads you towards a different destiny. Here, suspense and terror intertwine, challenging your wisdom and courage!

Here you are facing an unprecedented crisis, escape is your only choice!

How to choose

Should we choose to sink into endless cycles or bravely challenge the shackles of fate? But please be careful, every choice may lead you into deeper mysteries

Rich in multiple choices, you need to make choices about your behavior! Is it alive? Is it death?

The Truth of the World

Here, time loses its meaning and reincarnation becomes an eternal shackle. What do you want to know?

Searching for oneself

Should we move towards a bright future or sink deeper into darkness? Waiting for you to uncover the truth and rediscover our lost self

This may not be a game, this is a 'real' 'you'

The curse of reincarnation follows like a shadow

By collecting items, you gradually understand everything!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows7 64 bit
  • Processor: intel i3-3220 or amd fx-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT730 or equivalent Intel/AMD discrete or integrated graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Processor: inteli5-7600 or amd r5-1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050 or equivalent AMD discrete graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
